text.div:
Care Connect Condition Episodicity

A CodeSystem to identify the episodicity of a condition.

Copyright Statement: Copyright © 2016 HL7 UK

This code system https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/CodeSystem/CareConnect-ConditionEpisodicity-1 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
first FirstThe first episode of a condition.
new NewA new episode of a previously recorded condition.
review ReviewA review of an existing condition episode.
end EndMarks the end of an existing condition episode.

name: Care Connect Condition Episodicity
description: A CodeSystem to identify the episodicity of a condition.

concept.definition: The first episode of a condition.
A new episode of a previously recorded condition.
A review of an existing condition episode.
Marks the end of an existing condition episode.
